website_summaries.verdict: Shark's flagship robotic vacuum boasts the highest power and dustbin capacity of their lineup.
pros: This robotic vacuum can map your home and pick up where it left off when interrupted
A good option for those without WiFi, though many additional features are available through WiFi or the Shark Clean app
cons: Does not include the auto-empty dock

customer_reviews.title: Recommend! Nice vacuum robot.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum robot works really well in my home. It has an app on my phone, which I can remote control easily. The robot will generate a map of your home after several cleanings. And after that, you can direct it to clean specific part of your home. It haven't stuck anywhere in my home yet. I have two vacuum robots, this one definitely wins over the other brand. Anyway, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not what you see in pictures. Misleading ad.
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost is the picture showing the Shark with a large self cleaning dock which it does not have. Called Shark with issues on app functioning and losing connection. They stated would contact within 24 hours with tech support. 48 hours latter and no call. I was able to fix issue myself. The unit cleans and seems to do a good job it just isn't the item they pictured in their sales add. third pic down on left side shows self cleaning dock. Very Misleading.
customer_reviews.author: terrycarpenter

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my Shark Robot! I bought a used Roomba to see if I liked having a robot vacuum. I did. But after a while it wouldn't go through an entire cycle without stopping. So I started doing research. I love how this one maps the house and cleans in straight lines and not random passes. In addition I have five cats and I don't have to clean the hair off the rollers. That's a win for me. I highly recommend this vacuum. Lastly, it's fairly quite too!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Shark IQ RobotTM Vacuum R1001 with Wi-Fi & Home Mapping
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: my initial problem registering my Email/Password was resoled due to a Five year old Shark Account when I had purchased a Bag less Rotator Standup Vacuum, I used the old password worked good and Completed Setup and Connection to my WIFI Network, my Shark IQ Robot Vacuum charged up quickly and began Mapping my Living Room and Kitchen floor with no problem so far it is working as advertised and Quite, it had no problem returning and docking with the Base to Recharge.
customer_reviews.author: George Vandervort

customer_reviews.title: Works without wifi 🤗
customer_reviews.text: I have wifi and alexa but was terrified as to how to set it up. We let it change overnight and while I was trying to set ip wifi re-reading the instructions..........she simply hit the start button; the vacuum starts talking and begins cleaning. This thing is amazing, learns on its own and returns to the base and shuts off. Does a very good job cleaning. Bottom line; she loves it she loves it so I love it 💕 Remark # 2. I purchased the one that is “not” self dumping for less than half of the self dumping and very happy with that choice 🤗 you have to dump the self dumping one too 🤪 duhhh Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: JRobin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing life changing product
customer_reviews.text: I’m single guy working in intensive industry in a new city by myself. Before getting this, I don’t vacuum my apartment often. Got messy place and affect my life quality. After getting the vacuum, it schedules cleaning every weekdays while I’m out working. I always get a neat apartment back home which is great!
customer_reviews.author: MartinZ

customer_reviews.title: Watch and see what its doing
customer_reviews.text: I had to return. It finisher the job and then started cleaning again and again. Did not try to doc on its own. On room it cleaned 4 or 5 times. Do not see one for me in the near future. Sorry. Got a new one. Its perfect . 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Carol of Bakersfield

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: We love this vacuum. We use it every day. Best investment we have made in awhile. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars was because the user manual & online FAQs are very lacking in details. For instance, I was finally able to map rooms, but no where can I find how to choose the room I want it to clean if I only want it to clean one room.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Green

customer_reviews.title: Love the shark!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this vacuum ( I named it Wall-E). After the first run I emptied the dust tray, and was blown away at the dust and debris it had picked up. It has mapped out my house and cleans by room. I have scheduled it to run everyday at 8am. We have three dogs and two cats inside, and it helps tremendously to keep the hair at bay. Funniest part is, when it turns on my 3 year old and 6 year old run to pick their things. They don't like it trying to eat their things.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We had a roomba and loved it but found that the shark was a bit quieter. We keep our roomba upstairs and shark downstairs. It is wonderful in that it maps the house and gets the job done. We have dogs so running it daily keeps the hair away. Ideal for pet owners! The WiFi connectivity is a plus as well. We can set a schedule or start/stop it when away from home.
customer_reviews.author: NatalieCK

customer_reviews.title: Love the App function!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum! I wish it ran for longer than an hour, however since you can run it from your app from anywhere I just restart it once it charges a little! The “home mapping” function doesn’t really work all that well, however I run it multiple times a day and select “whole house” and it goes a different way each time and covers everything eventually. Overall I’d buy this again and highly recommend it! Can’t believe how much it picks up!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hoekema

customer_reviews.title: Would like this product of  it done what it does on video
customer_reviews.text: Repeats same area doesn't go into other rooms without picking up and physically pick up sir down and close Door to keep in the room
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love it. It has decent suction on tile floors, but it seems to miss quite a bit. It bumps against a leg, couch, or wall and it will go in the opposite direction and leave the room unfinished. It tries to come back later and finish the room, but never seems to cover all the missed areas. I just can’t justify spending this much money when I still have to get my upright vacuum out and finish rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: This Shark is a MISS!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few robot vacs from all the major players and this one while being on the upper end of the Shark line looked great it sucks (not literally) and makes a lot of noise. I would skip this model! LOUD, NO SUCTION and high priced for its abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: A big let down
customer_reviews.text: All the hype and anticipation was kind of for nothing. I couldn’t wait to get this, as I had had a Roomba previously which went in sporadic places with no rhyme or reason. I had my Roomba for about five years before it finally broke. I was excited for the mapping and self cleaning brushes. It cleans ok, it only connected to wi-fi for maybe 2 minutes and hasn’t connected again since, therefore, no mapping. (I have no internet connections with any appliance/services) Customer service couldn’t troubleshoot the connection issue. Still debating returning it or trying to be thankful with something I have.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Rosie our maid!
customer_reviews.text: I love “Rosie”, our Shark IQ RV 1001! It does an excellent job. Maps perfectly and does not miss spots. You will not be disappointed! I can turn her on with my phone home or not at home. Well worth the money. The strips for her not go in or under things work beautifully. In this case you are getting a good deal for your money. Love, love Rosie! Ps. Update. Rosie maps and returns to the dock without any problems. She does not miss any spots. Recommending Rosie to my friends and family!!!
customer_reviews.author: scooby18629

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: Geoffrey is AMAZING! We have a German Shepard- so we have hair all the time. He goes from the hardwood floors to carpet with ease. I can honestly say I will never be without a device like this. Our house is about 1800 sq ft. He doesn’t go into 2 bedrooms, runs about 1 1/2 hours 3 times a week minimum. And he’s compatible with Alexa which is great.
customer_reviews.author: connie lake

customer_reviews.title: Can't find it's way home
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Shark for a week now. It does vacuum well. Finds it's way around just fine. Hits all the rooms. That being said it has never found its way home yet. After the vacuuming is done it just roams around until it stops and gives me a error code. My house isn't large, 1500 SqFt. For the price I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I have a small 1000 sqft condo with all tile flooring in Medellin Colombia. The air can get a little polluted here so there is always some gritty particulate on my floors every few days. Not anymore! My buddy Shark picks up everything. I have not had to vacuum in a month. I mope once a week and my floors are barefoot sanitary.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: The gadget I never thought I need
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this shark robot vacuum! It does an excellent job and gets the job done without any issues. Between 4 kids and 2 dog there are lots to clean. Having this robot vacuum has made such a difference and it works well! We also have a competitor model (more experience, supposedly the better product) which gives me constant grieve, always a different issue. This shark vaccum has been fantabulous, the self cleaning brushes work great, the suction is great, the mapping works well and it takes care of the oh so many dog hair. Overall, wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Byron Conquest

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This might be the best thing I've ever bought myself well worth the money an excellent product and it cuts my chores in half I don't need to pull out the big vacuum cleaner as often. It does a good job over all surfaces and gets under furniture that I normally couldn't get to this product has made my life so much easier I highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Katz

customer_reviews.title: Doing ok for little while
customer_reviews.text: It worked good for 4 months, after that side brushes broke and needed to be changed. Main roller was pretty much done at this time. I have two dogs and four cats leaving hair on carpet. At first it was no problem for the shark, but Now it doesn’t pick up as good anymore. I changed All brushes and cleaned the. Whole shark, but still doesn’t pick up stuff, although All filter were changed. Now it gets out of the base and after about a minute or two it stops consistently with error. Saying it’s on an uneven surface and that there is an obstruction underneath where there is none.
customer_reviews.author: Bobboe

customer_reviews.title: #sounds like tractor
customer_reviews.text: First one broke after first one. The send replacement and it sounds like a bulldozer in the house. The noise will tear this thing up, but I am tired of Amazon shipping defective products with the customer having to reship it. I am in Dallas and they want me to drive 10 miles to a “drop off box” to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Foster

customer_reviews.title: Jaws for the win!
customer_reviews.text: We looooove this vacuum!! We named him Jaws. I have friends with other Robo vacuums that bounce all over the place sporadically and have been hesitant to get one because it seemed hit or miss. But this guy goes back and forth in rows and does a great job. We have been amazed and disgusted how much dust and hair Jaws picks up each time he runs.. we’ve been running him 1-3 times per day as he’s learning to map the house and even still, he’s picking stuff up. The only criticism is that he only learns to map one floor. So we bought a second one for downstairs. Have they made Robo vacuums to clean stairs yet??
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: You must buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice cleaner machine for the room. High quality type, recommend for all single home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with how well this robot vacuum does on hard wood floors and my area rugs. I love how it knows where it's been and where it still needs to go. Couldn't ask for anything more. So far it has found its dock everytime even when it moves the dock to clean around it. Even finds it way into dark rooms and on my black area rugs. Totally worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: A Regrettable Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The navigation on this thing is terrible. It does not go in straight lines. As other reviews have stated, it constantly runs into it's own base. Used multiple times and it hasn't completed a map yet. Had a Neato a few years ago that broke after 15 months. However, the navigation on the older Neato was far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Jax67

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for dog hair and hard floor
customer_reviews.text: Best decision ever!! My dog sheds a lot and the hairs everywhere were driving me crazy! I was actually vacuuming everyday and I just couldn’t do it anymore. Now I just turn it on before I leave to work in Max and super clean by the time I get home. It’s been getting better with the mapping each time. Only used on hard floor. The picture is what picked up in only one day, as you can see it’s mostly hairs and it’s so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Luna R

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this vacuum. It works as advertised, I'm very happy. We have two small dogs both of whom shed and the Shark takes care of the fur. The first time we used we were amazed at just how much it picked up. Fantastic tool to supplement the usual weekly house clean. Very happy the price to ease of use to effective ratio is very high. I would recommend this vacuum to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Delland P Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with my purchase. It has done an outstanding job of picking up dirt. It will return to dock and recharge when necessary and resume when charging is complete. If the bin gets full during the vacuuming process it will return to home base and empty the dirt then resume where it left off. When it arrived it was packaged very well and set up was super easy!
customer_reviews.author: MJess

customer_reviews.title: Needs a large open wall space
customer_reviews.text: Can’t comment because I returned. Make sure you have a large OPEN wall space for this to work. I have no open wall space - certainly not a 3 x 5 space
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: Best robot vacuum on the market
customer_reviews.text: We love our shark!!! It is low enough it fits under more places then a roomba we know from experience. It manages the house so great and handles changing height with a breeze we were really shocked at how well it handled our shag and thick rugs. We have had it awhile now and have had no issues. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cc

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shark
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a fathers day gift. Works awesome. Didn't take more than 4 days for it to map the house with the App. Texts when it gets hung up somewhere. Dog doesn't seem to mind it and it hops from carpet to wood floors to tile and back again with no problems. Every once in a while it moves something (Coffee table, hamper) so I'm not sure what the torque or tow rating is on this beast, other than that has done a wonderful job for them running daily
customer_reviews.author: Esmond Duffey

customer_reviews.title: My best frand
customer_reviews.text: I love my Shark! It’s my go to brand for floor cleaning appliances. We have named ours robot Zita and she’s my best friend. I’ve even been accused by my own children of loving Zita more than them. I tell them it’s because she doesn’t make any messes and cleans up after others. It took about 4 runs before she had the house mapped, but I really do feel like she gets all the dust I just can’t get to. My mop water is much clearer if I let Zita run beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness, big power in such a small machine
customer_reviews.text: After a huge disappointnent from the Deebot robo vaccuum thisShark is INCREDIBLE. It actually goes back and forth in a perfect line. The Deebot would just go in random circles and never get anywhere. This is definitely worth the money. It's smart, it's sleek, it follows direction, I have 3 cats and they always scatter litter everywhere. It picks up dirt and litter so good. I definitely recommend this to anyone that has pets.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa mcCracken

customer_reviews.title: Love my vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. Setup was easy. I have it set to go every other day, and I can look on the app to see what has been cleaned. This vacuum picks up so much dirt. I was amazed. I have a kirby and this shark is better.
customer_reviews.author: lynn livesay

customer_reviews.title: My wife OCD did not like the zig zag of the cheaper robot vacs.
customer_reviews.text: Using it it now for a few days and it mapped out the house on the first run. Pretty accurate on the obstacles.
customer_reviews.author: Phanord's

customer_reviews.title: Adequate performance, poor support and programming
customer_reviews.text: I like the systematic way it operates, and the machine functions well. It won't pick up even small blades of grass, but does a good job on dust, lint and cat hair. The map function often will not come up, and accessing it causes the app to stop. I had two successful runs telling the Shark which rooms to vacuum, but this morning was unable to access that part of the program when I wanted to exclude the Master Bedroom from the daily vac. The Map function is very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for our home which includes three labs. we waited years too long to invest in this. our stress is reduced SO much as the clusters of hair are quickly picked up by our little smart shark. only complaint is that it can be a bit noticeable and noisy when you have it on the highest suction setting. works fabulously though so in my opinion - WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the shark products
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help stay on top of normal cleaning other than it getting stuck on a couple of high transitions and taking forever to map out house this thing is amazing it works just as well as our shark stick vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Ed C.

customer_reviews.title: It does a great job
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, we have had it for several months . we use it on hardwood , carpet & tile. works great & covers every inch in a room. Love it, we call it Hazel.
customer_reviews.author: Larry P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing time saver
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. We have a pet cat an a chiwuawa so pet hair is definitely a thing but with this magic robot it keeps it all up off the floor. Saves us lots of time through the work week to enjoy other things in life cause honestly who likes sweeping an vacuuming when they get home from work after a long day
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Mapping was very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this shark for 2 week before I returned it. It never even mapped 50% of my house. On most days I was surprised when it would never leave one room. We had bought a roomba 675 at Christmas but thought the IQ mapping would be better than the random roomba. That wasnt the case. The shark left very little nap in the carpet vs the 675, and the shark moves so much slower. Hands down the 675 won and that's why we returned the shark.
customer_reviews.author: todd strickland

customer_reviews.title: Definite Hair Wrap
customer_reviews.text: The Shark IQ R101 advertises that it does not get hairwraps. Our was constantly getting jammed and that was after vacuuming with a traditional upright first. The picture with my review was from then. I would get constant notifications that the robot stopped cleaning because it would jam up so much which made it very useless.
customer_reviews.author: MPJ

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, but loud. I have had 2 issues where it started running into the dock. Like it couldn’t see it...had to power down. But it cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Large dust bin
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like. It does a great job and remembers where it was between charging cycles
customer_reviews.author: JoeC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: We had an irobot. I hated it! It was louder and picked up so much less!! We have 3 dogs and hardwood floors. I wished we would have gotten the shark in the first place! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: klc5632

customer_reviews.title: Top of the class
customer_reviews.text: By far the best automatic vacuum on the market. Save time and gets even the smallest bit of dirt or grim.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Can’t map
customer_reviews.text: The robot doesn’t map the house and rooms, the exact reason why we purchased this robot. It does a great job of cleaning the floors, just can’t use the feature of telling it to clean a certain room because of it not being able to map out house.
customer_reviews.author: $$game trier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It’s very good and removes a lot of dog hair from the floor
customer_reviews.author: fasolini

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had a different one and it bit the dust. It’s a little noisier then the one I had before and I’m not sure if it’s my Wifi or the bot that is not connecting my phone and it together. It is also a little thicker then my other one so it won’t go under my couch. I love how it goes in rows, my other one didn’t do that.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get for cat litter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help pick up litter the cats leave around the house. Didn’t pick up all the litter and what it didn’t pick up, it slung in around. This was at max power also. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Cash

customer_reviews.title: made my daughters Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great vacuum and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Stantheman

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is amazing!! We just moved into a place and had the carpets cleaned and ran our new shark while we waited for the movers to bring our stuff. The picture is the result of once through the house!! It’s extremely quiet and can get our entire 1500 square foot house done with one charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: The thought doesn't count
customer_reviews.text: Was doing so good first day floors looked beautiful and u could tell it was mapping now it looks like it's on crack and can't remember what it's supposed to do. Turns on whenever stopped whenever
customer_reviews.author: Amber Maxon

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: WE USE IT MAINLY ON OUR WOOD FLOORS AND A FEW LOW PILE CARPETS. WE KEEP IT OUT OF THE BEDROOMS WHERE THE CARPETS ARE HIGHER. IT DOES A GREAT JOB. WE LIKE THE FACT IT WILL LET YOU KNOW WHEN IT CAN'T FIND ITS WAY BACK TO ITS BASE. IT HAS "DIED" ONCE WITHOUT ANY NOTICE - BUT SO FAR, WE ARE HAPPY WITH IT.
customer_reviews.author: JMiller

customer_reviews.title: I can watch tv while it’s cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered cause I have a cat that seems to shed a bit but got tired of vacuuming everyday. I looked at every kind online and this one had excellent reviews. Got it and tried it out..amazing! So much quieter then my boyfriends and seems to pick up better. Love that’s it has an app I can control it from.
customer_reviews.author: Kristennsanders

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The Shark met my expectations. Had a WiFi connection issued which was resolved by Shark customer service. But unfortunately after praising the product to a friend, he bought it much cheaper. The irony is I directed him to the site based on my research.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Davis

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. Picks up more dirt than a regular vaccuum cleaner. Can't believe how much dirt it does pickup. Would buy it again. A little noisey but the work it does makes up for the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Moriuchi

customer_reviews.title: Shark to the rescue!
customer_reviews.text: I love my shark. We have had it a couple weeks now and I couldn't be happier. We put laminate flooring down and I hated seeing the grass on it but I didn't want to vacuum every day. I let Shark do it for me now and it is amazing. Picks up the dog hair, grass and lint that I hate to see. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carla S.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite thus far
customer_reviews.text: Thus far the mapping feature has not finished but as to be expected with Christmas decor up when I started it, great suction for dog hair as I have a Saint Bernard and Jack Russell so tumbleweeds are thank god, a thing of the past. It is a bit noisy but I don’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Landes

customer_reviews.title: Great on pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is worth every penny. I have a long hair cat and a dog that sheds like crazy. The shark does a great job on pet hair!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie W.

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: This product never did connect to the WIFI. We sent it back unused. We have had other Sharp vacuums, not robotic ones that worked great. This one didn't work at all. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque Hughes

customer_reviews.title: 6 months & not so good
customer_reviews.text: After 6 month is continues to clean without stopping saying it’s stuck, but nothing is in its way... 😕
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hochstetler

customer_reviews.title: GREAT coverage
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for our son. He has programed it and it cleans everywhere and does a great job. He is very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn S Ross

customer_reviews.title: More bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: We have a couple of pet's and the hair is just crazy. We set through shark up to go twice a week and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Madhatter99

customer_reviews.title: Charging station
customer_reviews.text: This product works well except when returning to the charge station. It has a tendency to push the charging station around maybe i should try to secure it. Overall products works well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cotton

customer_reviews.title: It works great but too loud.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a great home helper, it starts automatically at schedule time and day, just don't forget to empty it. The only cons is noise level it's too loud.
customer_reviews.author: John Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Never stayed connected to WiFi. I have called over 8 times and nobody has been able to fix it. Claims it is a widespread issue and they are “working on it” with no timeline available. Each time I have to use it I spend 10 minutes reconnecting. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Kailey Meaney

customer_reviews.title: Beware before you buy Suction is horrible
customer_reviews.text: There is pretty much no suction power. I will even try sweeping up a pile of dirt to see how much it'll pick up and it just scatters the dirt around only picks up about 50% of the dirt in a pile. This was not worth over $200. Beware before you buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Not to smart
customer_reviews.text: No mapping after 20 runs already? The map don’t look like my floor plan
customer_reviews.author: Joe H

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far its an excellent product. Will update as time and use goes by
customer_reviews.author: Kim Byrd

customer_reviews.title: DON'T Buy
customer_reviews.text: Could not get it to connect with WIFI. Piece of junk which I returned
customer_reviews.author: Bobby L. Scarberry

customer_reviews.title: Christmas reject
customer_reviews.text: Order the shark iq box even said shark iq inside was I robot roomba 800 series most likely somebody return that there selling for new sent it back waiting for refund not very happy with there quality control
customer_reviews.author: charles k

customer_reviews.title: Dud!!! Died way too early for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Only had for 6 months and no longer works. Before it stopped working at all it would get stuck on nothing and start going in circles. Tried to reset but did not fix
customer_reviews.author: nathan hogue

customer_reviews.title: Buy a. Light battery
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to do a good job untill the dreaded error 2. A drive wheel does not work per customer pamlet. Got to call help line. Operated only 16 days. Previous one had drive wheel issues also.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great timesaver😃
customer_reviews.text: This works great so happy I bought it! Would 100% by again
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Smart!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, haven’t quite figured out how how it’s mapping the room but it does do a nice pattern and seems smarter then the average robot vac
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: push the clean button, and leave, we have a cluttered home, sometime he gets stuck in the bedding.
customer_reviews.author: cat lover

customer_reviews.title: Defective item
customer_reviews.text: Does not work want to return and I can't get anyone to help me from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst robot vacuum I’ve ever had! Never worked correctly no matter what I did! Ow sits and twirls in a circle!! Don’t buy this ! Worthless
customer_reviews.author: Angela Letard

customer_reviews.title: Great disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum did not map my home it goes everywhere Helter skelter. Have to run it at least twice in a row and then touch up with the big vac. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Bouhebent

customer_reviews.title: A good device for weekly cleaning.....
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough for what I need. Obviously, not the same as an electric cord device, but good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value for the dollar.  Maybe if it worked correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Will not go back to dock on it's own. Runs till battery is dead. You have find it and put in dock. Programmed to clean 1 hour. Doesn't stop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received a different brand then ordered
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even get the shark I received a used roomba so didn’t get to try it out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have the Shark ion IQ and this model surpasses what I previously saw from the IQ. The combination of both in my home with 3 dogs is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: D'Quan Cutno

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised.... it does a wonderful job picking up my Pomsky’s hair and keeping my hardwood floors with rugs clean.
customer_reviews.author: Knuckles

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: cleans the floor better then I thought it would. My wifes new best friend! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Joe Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Does what they say it does!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super vacuum. Best gadget i've ever bought. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean floors
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my kitchen floor our dog sheds a lot and this robot is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Kristi bellet

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: We love it... we love it ... We love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shark does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Shark Vacuum Cleaner. My first Shark was great with strong power, strong suction, and battery life. The other vacuums I purchased were returned, did not do the job. Keeping the vacuum clean and especially the brush roller will give the robot a longer life. I noticed the improved brush roller is designed to not get hair stuck on the roller, it is designed for someone with pets. I have a cat and dog and my home gets dirty fast, so having asthma I keep my bedroom clean. The Shark goes under my bed and cleans my hardwood floor. I paid a little more for this Shark, and it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: What's up with that?

customer_reviews.title: Love him
customer_reviews.text: Love my “Baby Shark”. Works great. I have owned him for awhile but just now doing review. Of course keep big things you wouldn’t run a regular vacuum across picked up. Remember it’s smaller so fits places your regular vacuum doesn’t. Otherwise we have no issues. I can’t live without my robo vacuums! I love that he cleans his own brissels! I love I can control this newer model with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Qcorbin

customer_reviews.title: Hardware is SHARK quality, Software nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I love my SHARK duo Roll vacuum. Keep finding "niceties" in design. Soo, I bought this IQ robot. Paired with smart phone. Cleaned twice, then quit. IT Lost its password. Downhill from there. AMAZON tech spent hours trying to help. After two weeks, back & forth to SHARK cus service in Columbia (the country). It worked only to get confused, again. Cleaned little. Will be looking for a stand alone robot or none, at all. Too much effort, too little help.
customer_reviews.author: ebIx

customer_reviews.title: Clean Floors are worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first robot vacuum ever. I’m pretty happy with it. It is quite loud, as others have said. I’m in a small apartment and have a dog, and it is so so nice to have the floors clean all the time. I couldn’t keep up with sweeping manually. I love that it cleans under the couch, and under the bed. It does seem to mostly not get hair tangled on the roller - I have long hair and it gets everywhere. My place is much cleaner overall, so I’m very glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Bmin7

customer_reviews.title: Works really well but..
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product but I had bought it's big brother previously, the one that cleans out the dustbin automatically. Since I had not been cleaning out the dustbin regularly on the first unit, i reasoned how hard can it be. Well it's not hard but it does need to be done daily and this really gets old. Had I known how much this pickups ever day and how often you should clean it it would have bought the self cleaning unit again!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Suctions well, but SUPER loud
customer_reviews.text: Seems to clean really well, mapping takes forever, and it súper súper loud!!! I am not sure yet if I am going to keep or not. I have been trying to select a room go clean but it says that it still need to vacuum more to map my house and then (who knows when) it will let me. Came very well packaged and simple instructions. App is better that I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Preston

customer_reviews.title: Loud, hard the empty, never stays connected to WiFi
customer_reviews.text: I have an older shark ion robot, and I FAR prefer the older one! I currently use both the old and the new one. The old one is quieter, stays connected to WiFi and is much easier to empty. This new one NEVER stays connected to WiFi (even though it predominantly cleans within 40 feet of wireless router and the old one is on a completely different floor from the router. The new one is so much harder to empty, and if the cup is full, it dumps the dirt on the floor as you pull it out. Very disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: James Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Our vacuum worked great for a few weeks then would say that there was something stuck underneath. Nothing would ever be there. We troubleshooted the vacuum for weeks. Called support twice. They finally sent a replacement. It has been good so far. I will update the review in a few weeks. I like that it maps the house and that I can schedule it to run while I'm not home. The suction seems to be good. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Michele S

customer_reviews.title: Lost it’s memory
customer_reviews.text: It took upwards of 30 runs to build my smart map three days later my vacuum didn’t know the difference between my bedroom and my kitchen ! Tech support wait it needed new firmware and told me it would happen that evening while it was charging. But it never fixed the problems and I sent it back. This vacuum was a great value with the options I wanted, I just couldn’t make it work foe me.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Railsback

product_meta.title: Shark IQ RV1001, Wi-Fi Connected, Home Mapping Robot Vacuum, Without Auto-Empty dock, Black
product_meta.description: With IQ NAV , your robot maps your whole home, allowing you to select which rooms to clean right now with Shark Clean App or Alexa. It methodically cleans row by row and navigates to the next room to assure total home cleaning. The Shark IQ Robot has Shark suction power and features a self-cleaning brush roll to remove hair wrap as it cleans. The XL dust bin and high-efficiency filter capture dust, debris, and pet allergens. Give your home a constant state of clean carpets and floors.Filter type: Non-washable
feature_bullets: Unbeatable suction vs. any Shark robot vacuum for pickup of large and small debris, as well as pet hair on carpets and hard-floors.
Self-cleaning brushroll removes pet hair and long hair from the brushroll as it cleans--no more hair wrap.
Schedule whole-home cleanings or target specific rooms or areas to clean right now with the Shark Clean app or voice control with Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant.
Total Home Mapping with Room Select maps your home and lets you choose which rooms to clean right now.
Methodically cleans row by row and then navigates room to room for complete home coverage.
Wattage: 35.3 W. Cleaning path width- 5.63 inch
